changes: Redesigned UI a little bit
Adjusted UI for 4K resolution
Added Config.VirtualPedPosition: this allows you to change the position and rotation of the virtual ped on the screen
Added Config.UseMoveKeyToCancel: you can allow players to cancel animations when they press W/S/A/D (Only if you cannot walk with animation)
Added additional protection against triggering animations when characters fall down

Added new parameter flag to animations.lua - this allows you to override the flag, this means that even when the player has MOVE selected, you can set, for example, flag 1 and he will never be able to walk with this animation
Optimized the code, there was a problem that when having the menu open for a long time with virtual ped resmon increased to huge values, now it is stable at 0.06ms with virtual ped running
Fixed a bug that caused virtual ped to try to run away when shot
Changed the method of detecting if an animation is synchronized - now you can create multiple categories with synchronized animations and they don't have to be in a separate section
Added auto detection of framework and skinmanager
Created export isMenuOpened: exports['vms_anims']:isMenuOpened()
Created export getAnimData: exports['vms_anims']:getAnimData()
Added Config.Core and Config.PlayerLoadedServer to the config.lua

Added saving walk style and expression in ESX and QB-Core metadata (for esx users: metadata in the framework was only introduced in version 1.9.4, if you have an older version, you must set Config.UseSaveableWalk and Config.UseSaveableExpression to false)
A config.server.lua file was created in which three framework functions were added

Added Config.AdjustedTeleportBack, if you want to prevent the possibility of passing through walls in adjusting the animation, you can run this, then when the animation ends the player will be teleported back to where he started it
Fixed bug with the ability to run the animation customization menu multiple times
Fixed premature cancellation of animation for Virtual Ped when quickly changing preview animation
Fixed a bug with multiple objects on Virtual Ped falling to the ground after closing the menu
Fixed loss of focus on input after running animation with auto-close UI
Converted animations from TayMcKenzieNZ RPEmotes resource for compatibility with vms_anims (https://github.com/vames-dev/rpemotes-for-vms_anims)
Fixed sending request for synced aniamation

Added the "Adjust" button to the menu and the Config.AnimAdjustCommandName command to the ability to adjust each animation (not scenarios) - you can still use the playerRotate option in animations.lua but if you use adjust the player can adjust each animation once
Added a new option to animations.lua: runFunction - it's a function to which you can add whatever you want e.g. events, exports whatever you need to trigger when running an animation
Added hiding of weapon menu during character rotation in animation adjustment menu
Added new exports.vms_anims:Cancel() - for cancelling animations launched via anims menu
Added new parameters to RunAnimationById export: disableAdjusting, options for synchronized animations
Fixed falling character during positioning
Corrected the problem of cancelling the animation of the virtual ped equally with the animation of the player, now it is separate, cancelling the virtualped will not also cancel the player animation
Corrected for RunAnimationById using time -1
Disabled ability to cancel animation when adjusting position, caused bug
Improved controls after closing menu with the focus menu on the search bar
Solved problem with shooting after pressing search bar with gun in hand
Added Config.DefaultQuestionMenuKeys - if you want to change the accept and reject keys of the animation proposal synchronized with the question default menu vms_anims, now you can change it there
Added for synchronized animations the ability to use with prop and particles - also added an animation example at the very bottom of the animations.lua file

Added Config.EnableSelfSyncedAnim: when searching for a player for a synchronized animation, the ability to select yourself among other players also could run this animation without selecting another player - displays a helpButtons menu in the lower left corner informing you that you can switch players with the E key

Added export RunAnimationById to the possibility of use with other resources so that you don't have to register and load animations in the future for other activities, you can do this with one simple export from vms_anims if it is also available in animations.lua
Added additional translation to E key in translations.js file
Fixed second prop in three dance glowsticks animations

The animation search has been changed - you don't have to type in the animation name from the beginning, e.g. DANCE GLOWS... to have the DANCE GLOWSTICK animation pop up for you, now you can just type GLOWSTICK and you will have it

Added Config.EnableMovingLoopRefreshTime - you can adjust the frequency of refreshing the loop that allows the player to move while the animation menu is running (for those who reported a problem that, for example, they can hit while using the menu, try reducing the value to, for example, 2/3)
Fixed bug with trying to send an animation to someone who wasn't around, which made it impossible to continue using the animation
Added preview of walking style on virtual ped
Added Config.VirtualPedPreviewWalkingTime
Added Config.UseCustomQuestionMenu & Config.CustomQuestionMenu - to use, for example, the vms_notify question menu from the last update.
When you cancel a synchronized animation, your friend will also cancel and be detached from you
Added Config.CheckingBeforeOpenMenu - You can add a check that, for example, the player is not handcuffed before opening menu
Added Config.CheckingBeforeStartAnimation - You can add a check that, for example, the player is not handcuffed before starting the animation
Added Config.NoPlayersAroundStartOnlyOnMe - if the player wants to run a synchronized animation but no one is around, the animation will run on him only
Fixed synchronized animation cancellation
Improved UI scaling for synced animation acceptance menu for 4K resolution
Fixed an issue with the display of a marker over the other player when selecting the player with whom to start a synchronized animation
Added Duration option to the synced animations - so that animations such as Hug are not looped
Added 2 new F*ck NSFW animations
Fixed loading animation list to UI
UI optimized, no longer loads all animations every run (should be much better in terms of menu loading time)

Added Config.CoreDefine, for one-time implementation of Core functions - the script is still possible to use in the standalone version, just don't complete it, but it is required for use if you want to use shared animations
Added Config.EnabledOptionsWithJoin, here you can add enabled options from joining (VirtualPed, Move, Loop)
Activate animation during positioning, so the player can accurately arrange the character in a particular place
Added marker above head players before sending request for synced animation, player can search for the exact person he wants to run animation with
Added Config.CloseUiWhenPlayerRunSyncedAnim, so you can enable the UI to automatically close when you start searching for a player to run a synced animation
Added Config.CloseUiWhenPlayerRunPositioningAnim, so you can enable automatic UI close when you run the animation positioning menu

Added Config.EnableMovingWithUI, this means that if you set this to true then players having the UI running can move further in the game (if a player on the UI presses the typing spot, moving is disabled until the typing spot is unfocused so that they don't walk or make other interactions while searching for animations)
Added some new synced anims - Carry, CPR, Hit head to head, Sitting on your knees, Blowjob
If you don't want to use opening the menu with Config.CommandName or Config.KeyBind, you can set it "" and it wont be loaded
Fixed visibility of menu accept shared animation
Fixed visibility of steering keys of positioning animation
Added ability to cancel synced animations via Config.CancelKey
Added Config.Hud (Ability to manage the display of the hud when the menu is running)
Added a new option Config.DisableKeyBindWhileDead to the config, you can disable the ability to open the menu if the player is dead
Fixed bug with minimap display after closing the animation menu
Added translations.js
Added Config.RunAnimWhileRunned, you will be able to turn on an animation without turning off the previous one
Added Config.DisableRunNextPositionedAnim, it will block the possibility of bugging the positioned animation so they can't trying to fly
Added posilility of disable animation if sitting in vehicle, add disableInVehicle = true in animations.lua
Visually improved keybind saving
Blocked starting new animation while currently has anim
Added synchronized animations for two players
Multiple opening of animation panel blocked
Added ability to setting position player animation when is triggered
The ability to run animations while falling has been blocked
In the config, you can set the animation positioning interaction keys, the border color, whether the border should be displayed in the player game, and its size
Added to the config the ability to disable display and use virtual ped for the entire server Config.FullyDisableVirtualPed, also then the animation preview icons are removed from each animation.

Added the ability to also add the use of the command (ExecuteCommand) when using the animation, for example, you can add to the animation of smoking a cigarette, ExecuteCommand = "/me lights a cigarette"
Added notification telling you how to add an animation to your favorites when you press on that category and there are none there
Added keybinds of animations
